ygData.subject: RE: Sense Magic
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually there is a use for Sense Magic other than practising Divination and that s to provide a personal fireworks show. Doesn t have the loud banging noises
ygData.messageBody:
Actually there is a use for Sense Magic other than practising Divination and that's to provide a personal fireworks show. Doesn't have the loud banging noises of Conjuration spells so it's much more pleasant. :-)

> ----------
> From: Twylork[SMTP:twylork@...]
> Reply To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, 31 August 1999 10:53
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Sense Magic
>
> From: "Twylork" <twylork@...>
>
> This skill was put in bets and has no real use other than whatyou stated in
> game. In final releasethey decided to stick with the right click identify
> option which everbody has.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: EQ Addict <the_ninth_ring@...>
> To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 1999 12:17 AM
> Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Sense Magic
>
>
> > From: "EQ Addict" <the_ninth_ring@...>
> >
> > Just wondering if anyone has found a valid use (other than training
> > Divination, for which it is perfect) for Sense Magic. It seems to me that
> > every item I find that is magical, clearly states so in the description.
> I
> > am assuming that there are hidden magic items (i.e. appear normal until
> you
> > cast Sense Magic on them), but has anyone ever found one?
> >
>
>
